${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:Initiate.NAME: Initiate
${modID}:Initiate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has full health, double the damage and gain that much Block next turn.
${modID}:Initiate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has full health, triple the damage and gain that much Block next turn.

${modID}:Quench.NAME: Quench
${modID}:Quench.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Increase the damage dealt by !M! for each potion drank this combat.

${modID}:Sightread.NAME: Sightread
${modID}:Sightread.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy's health equals or exceeds yours, gain 2 Dexterity. NL Otherwise, gain 2 Strength. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Sightread.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If the enemy's health equals or exceeds yours, gain 2 Dexterity. NL Otherwise, gain 2 Strength. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Fracture.NAME: Fracture
${modID}:Fracture.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL For each unblocked hit, the enemy loses 1 Strength this turn.

${modID}:FromHell.NAME: From Hell
${modID}:FromHell.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies gain !M! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust ALL cards in your hand and gain Strength and ${modID}:Outburst equal to the cards Exhausted.

${modID}:Extinction.NAME: Extinction
${modID}:Extinction.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, ALL future instances of this enemy will die upon spawning. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Shadowstep.NAME: Shadowstep
${modID}:Shadowstep.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Shadow. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Draw 2 cards.

${modID}:Pocket.NAME: Pocket
${modID}:Pocket.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Discard a card. NL Exhaust. NL ${modID}:Progressive - Draw a Rare card with this card.
${modID}:Pocket.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Discard a card. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Protrusion.NAME: Protrusion
${modID}:Protrusion.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Shadow. NL Gain !B! Block. NL ${modID}:Shadowplay - Gain !M! Thorns.

${modID}:SubconsciousKiller.NAME: Subconscious Killer
${modID}:SubconsciousKiller.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Shadow. NL Unplayable. NL ${modID}:Shadowplay - Gain 2 Strength and !M! Vigor.
${modID}:SubconsciousKiller.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL ${modID}:Shadow. NL Unplayable. NL ${modID}:Shadowplay - Gain 2 Strength and !M! Vigor.

${modID}:Injection.NAME: Injection
${modID}:Injection.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Shadow. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If this deals unblocked damage, apply !M! Poison. NL ${modID}:Shadowplay - Play this card at full effect.

${modID}:VanishingAct.NAME: Vanishing Act
${modID}:VanishingAct.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Shadow. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. NL ${modID}:Shadowplay - Retain your hand this turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Admire.NAME: Admire
${modID}:Admire.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Shadow. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy blocks this hit, gain !M! *Plated *Armor and draw a card.

${modID}:Eclipse.NAME: Eclipse
${modID}:Eclipse.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Shadow. NL Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Shadowplay - Swap the contents of your draw and discard piles.

${modID}:Shroud.NAME: Shroud
${modID}:Shroud.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Shadow. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Increase the Block of ALL Shroud cards by 2 this combat.

${modID}:Strangulate.NAME: Strangulate
${modID}:Strangulate.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${modID}:Strangle. NL ${modID}:Progressive - Play this card on an enemy that has at least 15 ${modID}:Strangle.

${modID}:Discretion.NAME: Discretion
${modID}:Discretion.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Apply !M! Poison. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Humiliate.NAME: Humiliate
${modID}:Humiliate.DESCRIPTION: Remove ALL your Strength. NL ALL enemies loses just as much Strength. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Humiliate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove ALL your Strength. NL ALL enemies lose twice as much Strength. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:OnlyADream.NAME: Only A Dream
${modID}:OnlyADream.DESCRIPTION: Choose a common or basic card in your hand. NL Exhaust it, then play a copy of it each turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Imprudence.NAME: Imprudence
${modID}:Imprudence.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle your discard pile into your draw pile. NL Draw up to !M! ${modID}:Shadow cards. NL Add 1 Slipup to your hand.

${modID}:Nope.NAME: Nope
${modID}:Nope.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Temporary_HP. NL You cannot gain Block from cards for 2 turns. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Bulwark.NAME: Bulwark
${modID}:Bulwark.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each enemy in combat. NL ${modID}:Progressive - Play this card while there are at least 4 enemies in combat.
${modID}:Bulwark.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each enemy in combat.

${modID}:FinishTheJob.NAME: Finish The Job
${modID}:FinishTheJob.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL If combat doesn't end after this is played, die. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ReactiveNet.NAME: Reactive Net
${modID}:ReactiveNet.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! *Plated *Armor. NL End your turn. NL The next time this enemy's Block is broken, they gain ${modID}:Strangle equal to their *Plated *Armor count.
${modID}:ReactiveNet.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! *Plated *Armor. NL End your turn. NL The next time this enemy's Block is broken, convert their *Plated *Armor to ${modID}:Strangle.

${modID}:Desperation.NAME: Desperation
${modID}:Desperation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E]. NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Outburst. NL Draw a card. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Control.NAME: Control
${modID}:Control.DESCRIPTION: Remove ALL your ${modID}:Outburst. NL Gain !M! Artifact. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Disengage.NAME: Disengage
${modID}:Disengage.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you have any ${modID}:Outburst, gain an additional !M! Block.

${modID}:Moratorium.NAME: Moratorium
${modID}:Moratorium.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Outburst. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Hide.NAME: Hide
${modID}:Hide.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each ${modID}:Shadow card in your hand. NL ${modID}:Progressive - Play this card while there are at least 3 ${modID}:Shadow cards in your hand.
${modID}:Hide.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block for each ${modID}:Shadow card in your hand.

${modID}:EscapeArtist.NAME: Escape Artist
${modID}:EscapeArtist.DESCRIPTION: You can't play Attacks for !M! turns. NL When this wears off, gain 6 Strength and [E] [E] . NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Liability.NAME: Liability
${modID}:Liability.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Shadow. NL Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Gain 2 ${modID}:Outburst. NL ${modID}:Shadowplay - Lower your Max HP by 2.

${modID}:Expurgate.NAME: Expurgate
${modID}:Expurgate.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Shadow. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Lose !M! HP.

${modID}:ShadowStrike.NAME: Shadow Strike
${modID}:ShadowStrike.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Shadow. NL Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Shadowplay - Apply !M! Weak to a random enemy.

${modID}:UnknownDepths.NAME: Unknown Depths
${modID}:UnknownDepths.DESCRIPTION: Add a random ${modID}:Shadow card into your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Arsenal.NAME: Arsenal
${modID}:Arsenal.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL For each ${modID}:Shadow card drawn, gain !B! Block and 1 ${modID}:Outburst.

${modID}:ChainedHits.NAME: Chained Hits
${modID}:ChainedHits.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Increase the number of hits by 1 this combat.

${modID}:Grasp.NAME: Grasp
${modID}:Grasp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is at or below 50% HP, apply !M! ${modID}:Strangle.

${modID}:NecroticJab.NAME: Necrotic Jab
${modID}:NecroticJab.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has ${modID}:Strangle, gain !B! Block.

${modID}:NothingPersonal.NAME: Nothing Personal
${modID}:NothingPersonal.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy doesn't intend to attack, deal !D! damage and gain !B! Block next turn.

${modID}:Gamify.NAME: Gamify
${modID}:Gamify.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Vigor for each enemy in combat.

${modID}:Perturb.NAME: Perturb
${modID}:Perturb.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ALL other enemies gain !M! Weak.

${modID}:HoldThis.NAME: Hold This
${modID}:HoldThis.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Plant a *Sticky *Bomb on an enemy that will deal !M! damage in 3 turns.

${modID}:TunnelVision.NAME: Tunnel Vision
${modID}:TunnelVision.DESCRIPTION: Discarded if not the first card played while in hand. NL Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Discard non-adjacent cards.

${modID}:OlReliable.NAME: Ol' Reliable
${modID}:OlReliable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack, gain !B! Block.

${modID}:Seethe.NAME: Seethe
${modID}:Seethe.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust ALL your non-Attack cards. NL Deal !D! damage for each card Exhausted. NL Gain 1 Strength.

${modID}:Onslaught.NAME: Onslaught
${modID}:Onslaught.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage repeatedly until the enemy dies. NL For each hit it takes, lose 4 HP.

${modID}:QuickKick.NAME: Quick Kick
${modID}:QuickKick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has less HP than you, *Stun them and gain 2 ${modID}:Outburst.

${modID}:Breach.NAME: Breach
${modID}:Breach.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL If this breaks the enemy's Block, remove all their Artifact, apply 5 Vulnerable, and *Stun them. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Tragedy.NAME: Tragedy
${modID}:Tragedy.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL ${modID}:Progressive - Use this card while you have at least 5 Strength.

${modID}:SewingNeedle.NAME: Sewing Needle
${modID}:SewingNeedle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL ALL enemies gain !M! ${modID}:Strangle.

${modID}:CleanKill.NAME: Clean Kill
${modID}:CleanKill.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal and exactly lethal, permanently start each combat with 1 more Strength. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Cobra.NAME: Cobra
${modID}:Cobra.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has ${modID}:Strangle, convert it to Poison and triple it. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Cobra.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has ${modID}:Strangle, convert it to Poison and quadruple it. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Harvest.NAME: Harvest
${modID}:Harvest.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, draw 2 cards and reduce their cost to 0 this turn.

${modID}:SkeletalFinger.NAME: Skeletal Finger
${modID}:SkeletalFinger.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this deals unblocked damage, enemy loses HP equal to its current Attack intent.
${modID}:SkeletalFinger.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL If this deals unblocked damage, enemy loses HP equal to its current Attack intent.

${modID}:RideTheHigh.NAME: Ride The High
${modID}:RideTheHigh.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Heal !M! HP. NL Gain 4 ${modID}:Outburst.

${modID}:Excel.NAME: Excel
${modID}:Excel.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Can only be played on turn 1. NL If you finish combat without taking attack damage, raise your Max HP by !M!.

${modID}:Nooseweaver.NAME: Nooseweaver
${modID}:Nooseweaver.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, ALL enemies gain 1 ${modID}:Strangle for each card played that turn.

${modID}:Nightlight.NAME: Nightlight
${modID}:Nightlight.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Discard a card. NL Apply !M! Weak to EVERYONE.
${modID}:Nightlight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Discard a card. NL Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

${modID}:Indoctrinate.NAME: Indoctrinate
${modID}:Indoctrinate.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M!X ${modID}:Strangle and 2X Strength to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Opening.NAME: Opening
${modID}:Opening.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, if no enemies intend to Attack, gain !M! Vigor.

${modID}:RiskyBusiness.NAME: Risky Business
${modID}:RiskyBusiness.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain ${modID}:Outburst, draw a card.

${modID}:Thrive.NAME: Thrive
${modID}:Thrive.DESCRIPTION: The next time you trigger ${modID}:Outburst, gain !M! HP.

${modID}:Veil.NAME: Veil
${modID}:Veil.DESCRIPTION: The first ${modID}:Shadowplay effect played each turn gets played an additional time.

${modID}:AssassinForm.NAME: Assassin Form
${modID}:AssassinForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, trigger the ${modID}:Shadowplay effect of all ${modID}:Shadowplay cards in your hand.

${modID}:Dominate.NAME: Dominate
${modID}:Dominate.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply ${modID}:Strangle to an enemy, also apply 1 Weak and 1 Vulnerable.

${modID}:Trade.NAME: Trade
${modID}:Trade.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Shadow cards can no longer be played. NL At the beginning AND end of your turn, for each ${modID}:Shadow card in your hand, gain !M! Block.

${modID}:ShadowDefend.NAME: Shadow Defend
${modID}:ShadowDefend.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Shadow. NL Gain !B! Block. NL ${modID}:Shadowplay - Apply !M! Vulnerable to a random enemy.

${modID}:ConcealedBlade.NAME: Concealed Blade
${modID}:ConcealedBlade.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Shadow. NL Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Shadowplay - Draw an additional card next turn.
